questions.question: What does the CSS `box-sizing` property do?
options: It defines how the width and height of an element are calculated: whether they include padding and borders or not.
It defines the border radius of an element.
It defines how an elementâ€™s content overflows.
It adjusts the spacing between elements.
questions.answer: It defines how the width and height of an element are calculated: whether they include padding and borders or not.

questions.question: Which property is used to control the order of flex items in a flex container?
How can you make an element's text overflow with an ellipsis (...) when it is too long?
What does the `z-index` property do in CSS?
options: It controls the vertical stacking order of elements that overlap.
It controls the horizontal position of elements.
It defines the transition duration for animations.
It sets the distance between the element and the top of the page.
questions.answer: It controls the vertical stacking order of elements that overlap.

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to create space between the content and the border of an element?
How do you apply multiple background images in CSS?
Which CSS property is used to define a grid layout?
What does the `flex-grow` property do in a flex container?
options: It defines the ability for a flex item to grow if necessary.
It defines the shrink factor for a flex item.
It aligns items along the flex container's main axis.
It sets the width of a flex item.
questions.answer: It defines the ability for a flex item to grow if necessary.

questions.question: How can you center an element horizontally using Flexbox?
Which property would you use to animate the change of CSS properties?
What is the purpose of the `min-width` property?
options: It sets the minimum width an element can have.
It sets the initial width of an element.
It defines the maximum width for an element.
It ensures the element will not shrink smaller than the viewport.
questions.answer: It sets the minimum width an element can have.

questions.question: How do you create a CSS variable?
What is the default value of the `flex-direction` property?
Which CSS property can create rounded corners for an element?
What does the `object-fit` property do?
options: It specifies how an image or video should be resized to fit its container.
It aligns objects in a flex container.
It specifies the aspect ratio of an image.
It adjusts the transparency of an object.
questions.answer: It specifies how an image or video should be resized to fit its container.
